channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Medicare Prescription Drugs Could Cost $500 Billion More Than Expected Over The Next Decade
item.description: A blog post by Congressional Budget Office staff dropped a bombshell: Spending on Medicare prescription drug coverage has exploded.

item.title: The Effort to Tame Tech Is Bound to Fail
Trump stumps for his economic success story to counter Democrats' 'affordability' narrative

item.title: Zootopia 2 Teaches Kids They Have Trauma And It’s Their Parents’ Fault
item.description: Now Disney seems to be pushing the message that the happiest place on earth is as far away from your family as possible.

item.title: Trump says National Guard member who survived shooting 'got up from bed'

item.title: Mrs. Shakespeare, Credit Hog
item.description: The literal-minded Hamnet abandons cultural outreach.

item.title: Democrat wins Miami mayor's race for the first time in nearly 30 years

item.title: KISS and Company at the ‘All-American’ Kennedy Center Honors
item.description: If Trump’s goal is to create a Kennedy Center for the people, then this year’s Honors ceremony seemed entirely designed to vindicate their tastes.

item.title: The Supreme Court Should Overturn Wong Kim Ark
item.description: The modern court has the chance to restore the 14th Amendment and end the judicially invented version of birthright citizenship.

item.title: Yes, Revive the Monroe Doctrine
item.description: We should, by all means, breathe new life into a doctrine that in recent decades has become a museum curiosity.

item.title: Florida Sues 3 Trans Groomer Groups For ‘Mutilating Kids And Misleading Families’
item.description: 'Defendants’ reprehensible and immoral actions capitalize on the mental distress of children,' the lawsuit states.

item.title: SCOTUS Appears Poised To Recognize That Presidents Run The Executive Branch
item.description: The arguments from Slaughter's attorney didn't appear convincing to the court's conservative justices.

item.title: The ‘Restrainers’ Get Their Consolation Prize
item.description: The administration’s National Security Strategy document would not create a safer world for Americans.
